clinical_study.brief_title: A Pilot Study to Evaluate the Effect of a Probiotic Mixture in Acne
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized, Double Blind and Placebo-controlled Pilot Study to Evaluate the Effect of a Probiotic Mixture in Acne Vulgaris

brief_summary.textblock: A 12-week randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled pilot study to evaluate the effect of a probiotic blend in the treatment and clinical and subjective evolution of acne vulgaris in adolescent and adult patients between 12 and 30 years.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in GAGS (Global Acne Grading System) index score at 12 weeks
primary_outcome.description: TOTAL SCORE = Nose S x 1 + Chin S x 1 + Front S x 2 + Right cheek S x 2 + Left cheek S x 2 + Torso S x 3 [Severity (S): 0 = Absence; 1 = Comedones; 2 = Papules; 3 = Pustules; 4 = Nodules] SCORE: 0 = Clean; 1-18 = Mild; 19-30 = Moderate; 31-38 = Severe; > 38 = Very severe

secondary_outcome.measure: AGSS (Acne Global Severity Scale) index score
secondary_outcome.description: Score between 0 and 5: 0 = Clean = Normal and clear skin without evidence of acne = Almost clean = There are some non-inflammatory lesions, with uncommon and non-inflamed papules = Mild = few inflammatory lesions (no nodule-cystic lesions) = Moderate = Noninflammatory lesions predominate, but multiple inflammatory lesions appear (nodule-cystic lesions may be present) = Severe = Inflammatory lesions predominate (nodule-cystic lesions may be present) = Very severe = Highly inflammatory lesions predominate (several nodule-cystic lesions)
Number of non-inflammatory, inflammatory and total acne lesions.
Compliance rate (in percentage) calculated as the number of leftover capsules divided by the total number of days between visits.

secondary_outcome.measure: Treatment safety assessed by number of adverse events
secondary_outcome.description: Number of adverse events that occur during the treatment period.

intervention.description: Probiotic with maltodextrin as a carrier.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Signature of informed consent by the patient (and their legal guardian in case of being under age).
- Age between 12 and 30 years-old.
- Moderate acne according to the AGSS (Acne Global Severity Scale) and / or GAGS (Global Acne Grading System) scales.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Contraindication of any of the components of the product under study.
- Topical or systemic use of antifungals and antibiotics in the previous 2 weeks.
- Consumption of probiotics in the previous 2 months.
- Use of systemic retinoids in the previous 6 months.
